title: Astrid
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Catering, Spanish, Tapas, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A 100% organic restaurant located in Old Town near Thyssen Museum. Serves breakfast, lunch, dinner and tapas. Offers many vegan meals, juices, organic wines and beers. Relaxed atmosphere. Has lunch specials. Kitchen open all day.
